conversation.speaker: Instructor
conversation.text: Hello, I will be your instructor to guide you how to defense our headquarters.

conversation.speaker: Instructor
conversation.text: You can press WASD for movement, and Space to jump, you can also do double jump as well.

conversation.speaker: Instructor
conversation.text: There will be a place for you to buy and place the tower to defense, and enemy will be spawn at the end of the road.

conversation.speaker: Instructor
conversation.text: You will win if all the enemies are destroyed, and loose if your headquartes loose all the health. Be strong and Good luck! :>
